alert.note: Alert for Allen; Putnam (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Putnam and northeastern Allen Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 752 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Continental, or 9 miles west of Ottawa, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kalida around 800 PM EDT. Glandorf around 810 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ottawa, Columbus Grove, Pandora and Bluffton. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 133 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
